title: ‘Spring’ Classics in Autumn, Experimental Race Formats: UCI Eyes Sweeping Reform for 2026
content:
The UCI is planning to restructure the racing calendar in 2026, and no idea is off the table – including moving Roubaix and Flanders.

Read the full article at ‘Spring’ Classics in Autumn, Experimental Race Formats: UCI Eyes Sweeping Reform for 2026 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
